article_title: Andy Beshear fights for Kentucky’s kids
article_text:
Lexington, KY (40506)

Today

Partly cloudy. High around 85F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Editorial Board

og.description: Concerned Kentuckians should be comforted to know that Attorney General Andy Beshear is advocating for Kentucky children and bipartisanship.
